trends: There have been 2 other sightings in patterson
There were no other sightings in patterson on or around November 29th 2007
Summary: saw it in sky after being wakened strangley in middle of night
divs: Sighting DetailsAt approximatly 2:26 am on November 29, 2007, i was awoken from a deep REM cycle strangley and for no reason as it would seem. I went downstairs and out the door into my front yard to clear my head - for it felt slightly fuzzy. I was looking at the stars and saw an object's distorted outline in the sky, only visible because of the moonlight. At first, I thought it was a place or something; i waited for the tell-tale flashing lights of Earth's aircrafts. It was slowly creeping a cross the sky, and I wondered what in the world it was. A thought of aliens filled my head but I shook it out. Then less than a minute after the sighting, there was a blinding flash of light; a star shape was in my vision for a couple of minutes after because of the brightness and the shape of the flash. I felt as if I knew something, but couldnt' remember what. The feeling is hard to explain, and I feel silly writing about it. Anyway, right after the flash, the object had disapeered. I searched the sky for what seemed like an hour but not a trace could be seen from my point of view. I then knew it was not a technology of Earth's.
